        Hope that helps you out alot!

item.source: How do i play i have been asking forever?!

item.title: How do i play i have been asking forever?!
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Well, since all ass holes like you seem to do is make fun of people… I will actually HELP him…

First thing you do… up in the right hand corner of this website, you will see a picture that says download moparscape, download it.

Second thing… Go to http://www.flashspace.us/serverstatus.php or codefasga.com/status.php and find a server(On codefasga, it will have green bars next to it if if’s working and on flashspace, all of the listed servers are working).

Third thing… Once you find a server, start moparscape, use any username and password, and in the IP space, type in server IP of the one you want (Example: Username-12345 Password-***** Server Ip- Example.no-ip.org (doesn’t have to be org).

Then, if you can’t get on try another one.

Any problems, post here.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2007, 09:02:17 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Runescape2007x, post:4, topic:111269”]If you cant play dont join mopar forums…[/quote]

and not everyone that’s on moparscape forums plays… some people just know alot about people and actually like to help people unlike you.

Read full topic
